amendment.description: An amendment numbered 122 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prevent funds from being used to finalize, implement, or enforce the proposed rule published by the Department of Health and Human Services entitled "Medicaid Program; Misclassification of Drugs, Program Administration and Program Integrity Updates Under the Medicaid Drug Rebate Program".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy amendment (A065) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Murphy amendment (A065) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Murphy amendment (A065) Agreed to by voice vote.
